channel.title: This game needs matchmaking
channel.description:
There needs to be a matchmaking type system in place. It is incredibly frustrating to play with new players or someone who is new to the class. Make a tryout test like heroes of the storm does with champs or something. I think this will decrease some of the toxicity. Right now the people are ruining the fun and the game.
Side note: can you change princes exe to only exe if it's evil and if it's bd then they still lose their executes. Too many princes who throw by executing clear bd and even say it before executing.

item.title: This game needs matchmaking
item.dc:creator: Flashu2
item.description:
bbiaglla:

Right now the people are ruining the fun and the game.

“Fun” is subjective, I find that esports tryhard kids ruin the “fun” of the game but that’s just my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: This game needs matchmaking
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Omnicent killers are worse than gamethrowers. Knight only works because he kills himself and even then I feel like it would be better if he just killed his target and didn’t die.

If it worked like that, Knights could gamethrow like hell. We don’t want to give people that opportunity.

But if we made Prince Omniscient, we’d have to make him suicide, and that’s no good.

Read full topic

item.title: This game needs matchmaking
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
Also I want to say there should be a bigger delay between text inputs. Sometimes it is way to hard to keep up with chat because people can enter text multiple times in a second or two. That has to be limited to like once every 5 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: This game needs matchmaking
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
People are idiots regardless of experience. Got lynched day 2 despite killing the sorcerer night one as a hunter yesterday. I was very salty

Read full topic
